A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi was a disgrace to the Star Wars saga. Questions were still unanswered\, plot lines that were introduced in episode 7 were ignored\, and the dialogue was horrendous (trying too hard to be funny). Disney took everything that was good about the Skywalker story line and just ruined it. The first half of the movie was slow going\, after that it was a regurgitation of episodes 5 and 6\, no new material. Severely disappointed and actually signed a petition to have this film removed from canon and Disney to remake it. Horrible.
